ReportSection.title: ATSEC Decision Regarding Merit Increment
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Simaan Abourizk
Dean of Engineering
Chair of the Engineering Faculty Evaluation Committee

I am writing to inform you that the Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee (ATSEC) has accepted the recommendation of your Department Chair and awarded you 0B, as the performance requirements for Incrementation have not been met.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your work this past year, and to wish you continued success in your teaching.

Should you have any procedural questions, please contact Catherine Pretzlaw, at enggdeanea@ualberta.ca.
